Technique: ENGOBE; FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL; PAINTED
Name: Bowl
Description: Semispherical bowl with inward turning rim, unstable base and curvature in the middle of the body. The rim presents a painted decoration consisting of a wine-red stripe as well as two very thin incised lines encircling the entire piece. Reddish-coloured paste. The surface bears a creme-coloured coating.
